sentences.sContent: Do you want to know more about Brazilian Culture?
sentences.sContent_eng: Do you want to know more about Brazilian Culture?
sentences.sCn: 你想了解更多关于巴西的文化吗？

sentences.sContent: However, Brazilian agriculturalists and ministers still talk as if it had no conservation value at all.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, Brazilian agriculturalists and ministers still talk as if it had no conservation value at all.
sentences.sCn: 然而巴西农学家和部长们还说它根本没有保护的价值。

trans.tranOther: relating to Brazil or its people
